name: Hide_Additional_CustomDev_GES
action: [IF]([EQ](<*CTX( Container(Experion_HS_Ges_Location_Labour).Row(1).Column(GES_Location).GetDisplayValue )*>,None)){<*DISALLOWATTRIBUTES(Additional_CustomDev_GES)*> <*CTX( Container(Additional_CustomDev_Labour_Container).Column(GES Eng).SetPermission(Hidden) )*> <*CTX( Container(Additional_CustomDev_Labour_Container).Column(GES Eng % Split).SetPermission(Hidden) )*>}{<*ALLOWATTRIBUTES(Additional_CustomDev_GES)*> <*CTX( Container(Additional_CustomDev_Labour_Container).Column(GES Eng).SetPermission(Editable) )*> <*CTX( Container(Additional_CustomDev_Labour_Container).Column(GES Eng % Split).SetPermission(Editable) )*>}[ENDIF]
